alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:52AM MST until January 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of around an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Leadville Vicinity and Lake County Below 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft
